description: Beautiful views of Lake Varese and its surrounding countryside, especially from the attractive summer terrace. At lunchtime, the upper section of the restaurant houses the bistro, while the elegant dining room provides the backdrop for more creative cuisine in the evening. Chef Silvio Battistoni is very well known in the region.
